channel.title: Please help with runserver error...in adding npcs...=(
channel.description: Ok I was trying to add some npcs to say things about going into wildi and looting other peoples things...and when i compiled i got no erros what so ever...but when i ran my server for some reason i got this: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "6 36 2463 3389 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cheerlead er" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2605) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:24) at server.main(server.java:27) So will you please tell me what to do about this? and how to fix it please...im pretty clueless about this...thanks if you can help :)

item.title: Please help with runserver error...in adding npcs...=(
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Soul2 -Dark Soul-
item.description:
@Dark_Soul2 wrote:

Thanks dude it worked im dumb lol

Use the “tab” button, not spaces.

item.title: Please help with runserver error...in adding npcs...=(
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Soul2 -Dark Soul-
item.description:
@Dark_Soul2 wrote:

Ok I was trying to add some npcs to say things about going into wildi and looting other peoples things…and when i compiled i got no erros what so ever…but when i ran my server for some reason i got this:
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “6
36 2463 3389 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cheerlead
er”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2605)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:24)
at server.main(server.java:27)
So will you please tell me what to do about this?
and how to fix it please…im pretty clueless about this…thanks if you can help
